exampleProps.title: Seasonal, Wood-Fired, Unforgettable
exampleProps.subtitle: Modern bistro celebrating local farms and live-fire cooking.

description: Short intro paragraph about cuisine & vibe.

exampleProps.heading: Wood-Fired Kitchen • Seasonal Craft
exampleProps.text: At Oak & Ember, we cook over live fire and source peak-season produce from local farms. Expect bright flavors, natural wines, and a warm dining room that invites lingering.
